description: Astilboides tabularis, commonly known as astilboides, is a fantastic, unusual Japanese perennial. Its large, palm-like foliage and gorgeous clusters of white flowers have made astilboides one of the most striking border plants around. Not only does astilboides have an eye-catching look, but it also is fairly easy to grow and care for. These plants thrive in moist, well-drained soil and partial shade, and can tolerate a wide range of temperatures. From the deep green foliage to its big, bold flowers, Astilboides tabularis is sure to capture your attention and instantly add interest to your garden.
